analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ZillaCrowdsale.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0xfd8971d5e8e1740ce2d0a84095fca4de729d0c16.sol#412-425):
	External calls:
	- _transferTokens(vault,0,zilla_remaining) (/unique_contracts/0xfd8971d5e8e1740ce2d0a84095fca4de729d0c16.sol#415-416)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- state (/unique_contracts/0xfd8971d5e8e1740ce2d0a84095fca4de729d0c16.sol#417-418)

ZillaCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0xfd8971d5e8e1740ce2d0a84095fca4de729d0c16.sol#521-533) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-p.remaining.sub(msg.value) (/unique_contracts/0xfd8971d5e8e1740ce2d0a84095fca4de729d0c16.sol#527-531)

Reentrancy in ZillaCrowdsale._transferTokens (/unique_contracts/0xfd8971d5e8e1740ce2d0a84095fca4de729d0c16.sol#498-505):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.crowdsaleTransfer(recipient,zla)) (/unique_contracts/0xfd8971d5e8e1740ce2d0a84095fca4de729d0c16.sol#500-504)
	State variables written after the call(s):
